description:
System Ninja is a fast, powerful and effective system optimization solution for Windows. It’s designed to quickly remove junk files, improve system speed and fix problems.

System Ninja has a small number of [plugins](https://singularlabs.com/software/system-ninja/plugins/) available that extend its functionality. Microsoft .NET developers can create custom utilities for System Ninja, allowing them to leverage the power of the System Ninja API.

#### Documentation
* [Features](https://singularlabs.com/software/system-ninja/feature-overview/)
* [Privacy policy](https://singularlabs.com/privacy/)

#### Community

* [Twitter](http://twitter.com/SingularLabs)
summary: Fast, powerful and effective system optimization solution
author: SingularLabs
